channel.title: Silent Planker (Color)(SRL)
channel.description:
[center]Silent Planker Beta(v0.7)[/center] By Silent SPY(nathanator22 here Silent SPY on SRL) [CENTER]What does it do?[/center] This script will take logs and change them into planks (P2P only) [B]Status:[/B]Working [B]Features[/B] [*]Supports all Plank Types (Normal, Oak, Teak, and Mahogany) [*]AntiBan [*]Fail-safes [*]Makes Planks! [B]Setup Instructions[/B] [*]Make sure you have Simba, SRL, and [URL=http://"http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=66266"]SPS[/URL] installed correctly [*]Move Player to Varrock East bank [*]Have Logs that you want to be used visable in bank [*] Don't wear white (will still run, but may cause it to be slightly slower) [*]have money visable in bank [*]Fill out the player setup in the script [*]Set number of loads at the top [B]Known Bugs[/B] [*]SPS access Violations. (Try restarting Simba and trying again) [*] [I]Rare[/I] walking bug, ends up somewhere west of the bank. (cause unknown) [*] Trouble withdrawing Mahogany logs. ( Will be fixed in next version) [B]Still To Come[/B] [*]Better Anti-ban [*]Multiplayer [*]More Fail-safes [*]Better progress report [*]Suggestions? Please post the (small) progress report that this script generates. It's not much yet, but I would still like to see how it's doing. :rolleyes: Also if you experience any bugs, please post them here with a short description, and the debug log from before it happened. Thanks and enjoy :) ================ Best Proggy So far: [QUOTE] /===============================================\ Finishing load #164 script has been running for..5 Hours, 58 Minutes and 21 Seconds Planks made = 4416 \===============================================/[/QUOTE] Proggy from my tests:
/=======================================================\ | Finishing load #126 | Running for..5 Hours, 24 Minutes and 27 Seconds | oak Planks made = 3384 \=======================================================/
/=======================================================\ | Finishing load #113 | Running for..4 Hours, 42 Minutes and 52 Seconds | oak Planks made = 3058 \=======================================================/

item.title: Silent Planker (Color)(SRL)
item.dc:creator: @nathanator22 nathanator22
item.description:
@nathanator22 wrote:

[center]Silent Planker Beta(v0.7)[/center]
By Silent SPY(nathanator22 here Silent SPY on SRL)

[CENTER]What does it do?[/center]
This script will take logs and change them into planks (P2P only)
Status:Working

Features

[]Supports all Plank Types (Normal, Oak, Teak, and Mahogany)
[]AntiBan
[]Fail-safes
[]Makes Planks!

Setup Instructions
[]Make sure you have Simba, SRL, and SPS installed correctly
[]Move Player to Varrock East bank
[]Have Logs that you want to be used visable in bank
[] Don’t wear white (will still run, but may cause it to be slightly slower)
[]have money visable in bank
[]Fill out the player setup in the script
[*]Set number of loads at the top

Known Bugs

[]SPS access Violations. (Try restarting Simba and trying again)
[] Rare walking bug, ends up somewhere west of the bank. (cause unknown)
[*] Trouble withdrawing Mahogany logs. ( Will be fixed in next version)

Still To Come

[]Better Anti-ban
[]Multiplayer
[]More Fail-safes
[]Better progress report
[*]Suggestions?

Please post the (small) progress report that this script generates. It’s not much yet, but I would still like to see how it’s doing. :rolleyes: Also if you experience any bugs, please post them here with a short description, and the debug log from before it happened.

Thanks and enjoy

Best Proggy So far:

[QUOTE]
/===============================================
Finishing load #164
script has been running for…5 Hours, 58 Minutes and 21 Seconds
Planks made = 4416
===============================================/[/QUOTE]

Proggy from my tests:

/=======================================================\ | Finishing load #126 | Running for..5 Hours, 24 Minutes and 27 Seconds | oak Planks made = 3384 \=======================================================/
/=======================================================\ | Finishing load #113 | Running for..4 Hours, 42 Minutes and 52 Seconds | oak Planks made = 3058 \=======================================================/
